department: Department of Public Works and Government Services
description: Canada Border Services Agency has a requirement to purchase a Digital Density Meter (DDM). Delivery to Ottawa, ON must be on or before March 31, 2024. Bidders must meet the mandatory requirements detailed in the Request for Proposal.
duration_in_months: As per the delivery date, it is expected the contract will last 3-4 months
full_summary:
================

**Title:**
Digital Density Meter
------------------

**Reference Number:**
WS4171805065-Doc4283216923
-------------------

**RFP Document Information:**
This Request for Proposal (RFP) was posted on Ariba Discovery and CanadaBuys. The bid submission deadline has been corrected and all bidders must submit their proposals by **14:00 EST on November 29, 2023**.

**Tender Description:**
The Canada Border Services Agency (CBSA) is seeking a Digital Density Meter (DDM) with delivery to Ottawa, Ontario by **March 31, 2024**. The procurement method is competitive-open bidding, and the selection criteria are the lowest price.

**Amendment Details:**
Please disregard the initial submission deadline and follow the corrected instructions above.

**Contract Information:**
* Expected Start Date: December 18, 2023
* Expected End Date: Not specified
* Procurement Category: Goods and Services
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Government Buying Entity:**
* Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5
* Contact Person: Adriana Gonzalez (adriana.gonzalez2@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**End-User Entity:**
* Canada Border Services Agency (CBSA)
* Address: 333 North River Road, Ottawa, ON K1L 8B9
